title: Cylindera germanica muelleri
text: Cylindera germanica muelleri is a subspecies of <a href="tiger%20beetle">tiger beetle</a> in the genus "<a href="Cylindera">Cylindera</a>". This subspecies is the least widespread of all of the four subspecies of <a href="Cylindera%20germanica">Cylindera germanica</a>, occurring only in <a href="Italy">Italy</a> and <a href="Greece">Greece</a>.
